title: A breve cronycle of the Bysshope of Romes blessynge and of his prelates beneficiall and charitable rewardes. from the tyme of Kynge Heralde vnto this daye.
author: Gybson, Thomas, d. 1562.
publicationStmtPublisher: By [R. Wyer for] Iohn Daye, dwellyng in Sepulchres parish at the signe of the Resurrection a lytle aboue Holbourne Conduite. Cum priuilegio regali, ad imprimendum solum,
